transferred national governments and central banks autonomous european monetary fund members jealously guarded sovereignty economic and monetary matters basic problem ems that governments not prepared make quantum leap situation decisions common economist closely watched system development result that divided policy currencies accentuating economists system greatest weakness vulnerability weak dollar past months dollar plunged and investors moved into strong currencies resulting sharp rise west german mark severely strained system mark soared dollar rose ems currencies favoured international investors and west germany last year refused give pressure partners and united states cut interest rates slow mark rise ems had realigned twice ease financial and trade strains community lend ems political support keeping pound major world currency system change british government attitude expected country general elections due mid meanwhile system last realignment since set prompted
